DOC.detailed_description: Information obtain Drugs Pregnancy Project database ( DPP - FIN ) Medical Birth Register ( MBR - SWE , NOR ) . The Finnish DPP Norwegian MBR include information stillbirths foetuses birth weight least 500 g gestational age least 22+0 Gestational Week ( GW ) . The Swedish MBR include data stillbirth 28 GW The estimated number pregnancy MS patient needed 1671 , encompass data : ) FIN : 1 January 1996 - 31 December 2014 ; ii ) SWE : 1 July 2005 - 31 December 2014 ; iii ) NOR : 1 January 2004 - 31 December 2014 .
